name: 4 in Watch - Wear Game
description:
The game consists of trying to put 4 tiles of the same color in line, vertically, horizontally or diagonally. The first who joins 4 wins.

Can play against the machine or against a friend. And of course, compatible with Apple Watch, so you always have it on and you can play from your wrist!

Can select between 4 different styles of minimal colors, so that apart from playing, you play with beautiful style.
